text: Adam Rainer (1899– 4 March 1950) was the only person in recorded history to have been both a dwarf and a giant.Guinness World Records, 2004. He is believed to have had acromegaly. ==Biography== Rainer was born in Graz, Austria-Hungary.Bellows, Alan. "The Man Who Was a Dwarf and a Giant", DamnInteresting.com, 1 December 2005. In 1917, at age 18, he was measured at , then in 1918, at age 19, he was measured at . A typical defining characteristic of dwarfism is an adult height below . Then, likely as a result of a pituitary tumor, he had a dramatic growth spurt so that by 1932 at the age of 33 he had reached a height of .Hirsch, Obar. Two Types of Gigantism Due to Similar Tumors. Discussion of Growth* Confinia Neurologica, Vol.21, No.4 (1961) As a result of his gigantism he became bedridden for the rest of his life.
